title: Limerick Acupuncture & Homeopathy Clinic | Leslie Salazar
description: Your Holistic place in Limerick, where Leslie Salazar will help to balance your body and mind through Acupuncture & Homeopathy. Pain relief, Stress, Anxiety, Migraines, Allergies, IVF, etc
sitename: Acupuncture and Homeopathy Holistic Medicine Clinic
cleaned_text: Alternative medicine system to help your body achieve its natural balance. Mind and body. Homeopathic remedies are made from plants, minerals, etc., the remedies are prepared according to Hahnemann,s technique of "potentization" using dilution and succussion, were still effective in alleviating the same symptoms in the sick person.
